About me

Hello! I'm Adam Troxell, a Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating seamless and dynamic web applications. I've recently completed an immersive 20-week Full Stack Development program at Emerging Digital Academy, where I honed my skills in HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Node.js.

With years of experience in technical support, project ownership, and leadership, I bring a unique blend of technical expertise and customer-centric focus to my development work. My background includes roles as a Solutions Manager, Customer Coordinator, and Technical Support Specialist, where I developed a deep understanding of user needs and the importance of delivering high-quality solutions.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a proven track record in managing and leading projects to successful completion. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn and adapt to new challenges. My goal is to leverage my diverse skill set to build innovative solutions that make a positive impact.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new travel destinations, cruising with my wife, or enjoying the thrills of theme parks. I'm a progressive thinker who values diversity, inclusivity, and continuous learning.

WanderWise

WanderWise is a travel planning application designed to streamline the process of organizing trips. It allows users to manage trip details, create daily itineraries, and map out locations with ease. Developed with a focus on user experience and functionality, WanderWise aims to be the ultimate companion for travelers seeking to plan their adventures efficiently and enjoyably.

View the project

Pizza Parlor Demonstration

This light app demonstrates the ability to create multiple pages using React and Redux to store information in state and pull that out and display information and transform it. This app demonstrates minor styling and my first foray into using Cards.
